explains: adj. 病态的；由病引起的；恐怖的；病变部位的

sentences.en: He had a morbid fascination with blood.
sentences.cn: 他对血有着一种病态的喜好。

sentences.en: Some people have a morbid fascination with crime.
sentences.cn: 有些人对犯罪有种病态的迷恋。

sentences.en: Jane has a morbid interest in horror films.
sentences.cn: 简对于恐怖电影有变态的爱好。
